page.title: 06LIGHTHOUSE CHURCH
page.content: {The Lighthouse Methodist Church }was first built in 1893 but since then it has been renovated to suit its present needs.A seafaring man called Captain King built a church in the shape of a lighthouse because he was associated with the sea and wanted to guide people to the Lord. The new design of the church means that there is a place for people to meet together for various activities such as morning and evening worship,Brownies,Guides,Cubs,Scouts and Rangers. Around eighty people go there every week to meet and make friends. The Lighthouse has become one of the well known landmarks of Walthamstow.
